headline: Simon速 to Present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that the Company will present at the BofA Securities 2025 Global Real Estate Conference on Tuesday, September 9, 2025 at 12:45 p.m. Eastern Time.
